H0.text: who is recognized as the founder of islam. Abraham

H3.text: who is recognized as the founder of islam. Muhammad

A4.text: Muhammad was an Arab religious, military and political leader and the founder of Islam.

A5.text: his teachings and normative examples form the basis for Islamic religious belief.
